text: ane je divase allaha ta'ala darekane bhega karase, (kahese) he jinnatonum jutha! Tame manavi'o manthi ghana lokone apanavi lidha, je manavi te'oni sathe hata, kahese ke he amara palanahara! Amara manthi eke bija dvara phayado uthavyo ane ame potana nakki karela samaya sudhi avi pahoncya je te amara mate nakki karyo hato, allaha kahese ke tamara saunum thekanum jahannama che jemam hammesa raheso, ham allaha icche to alaga vata che, ni:Sanka tamaro palanahara ghano ja hikamatavalo, jnanavalo che
